document.full_text: the criminal cases of hollywood star mel gibson and his former girlfriend ended on friday when a judge sentenced him to probation for hitting her and prosecutors declined to charge her with blackmail.
document.title: mel gibson gets probation for domestic violence
lines_and_colors: the criminal cases of hollywood star mel gibson and his former girlfriend ended on friday when a judge sentenced him to probation for hitting her and prosecutors declined to charge her with blackmail.
